targets.expr: sum by (pod, namespace) (kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace=~"$workload_ns"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left kube_pod_status_phase{namespace=~"$workload_ns", phase="Running"})
topk(20, sum by (host) (count_over_time({namespace="kube-system", pod=~"traefik.*"} | json | __error__="" | label_format host="{{.RequestHost}}" [$__range])))

list.description: Workload namespace(s) to include in Deployment & Pod panels
list.label: Workload NS
list.name: workload_ns
